name: BroomBrella
description:
On your way home from the witch academy you see your soup boiling away in the distance.

Hurry up and collect your last Ingredients - two Glowyflowers - for extra Umami.

Reach your cauldron full of soup before all the goodness boils away!

But be aware and dont peak into the house uninvited!

Developer Notes

This is our third game after our all-time classic skaterbo120xx (which sadly doesn't work anymore) and our creative comeback 20 Seconds to Boingglog

With BroomBrella we are chasing ambitions bigger than our current abilities, but we are very happy with the work we've done and look forward to your feedback!

Big shoutout to the 20 second game jam for getting us back into making games and even extending the deadline to allow us to give it it's polish while working full-time.

This is our fist time using Godot and we can only praise it, except that the web-export doesnt work, which is horrible. We will learn from our mistake of using beta 4 and come back even stronger. If anyone can help us to export it in godot 4 beta 7 please reach out to us through comments/dms
